name: VaporWave ~ DaviiSnake
description:
The classical Snake Game in a different view.

DaviiSnake is a game made in isometric view and with the feeling of VaporWave aesthetics it's also a birthday gift for one of my best friends filled with his hobbies and things that he enjoy :P

Background Music:  All Stars - Smash Mouth

Background Music 2.0: Happy Birthday Vaporwave
